nodes.text: The Return of the Jedi - The Film Novel

The Return of the Jedi - The Film Novel (French: Le retour du Jedi - Le roman du film) is a junior novel adaptation of Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. The Return of the Jedi - The Film Novel was written by Elizabeth Barfety and published by Hachette Jeunesse on September 9, 2015.

The time for the final fight is near. But before that, Luke and his companions must save Han Solo from the hands of the dangerous gangster Jabba the Hutt. For their part, Emperor Palpatine and the Lord Darth Vader decide to build a new station, even more destructive than the Death Star. Will the Rebels have the courage to face him and try the impossible a second time?
